document_data.mainbody:
shtha Gheldieg was a member of the Amnian House Gheldieg from the city of Eshpurta in the late 15 century DR.
In the , Ashtha Gheldieg was one of the clients who did business with the mummy lord only known as the Mystic Carrion of Baldurs Gate. The mummy procured a doll of the necromancer, a rare magic item for Ashtha to be used for some reanimation purposes. The record of the purchase was kept in Mystic Carrions lair in Philgraves Mansion in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate.
